import React, { useState } from "react"; import axios from "axios"; import useAuth from "../../hooks/useAuth"; import { useForm } from "react-hook-form"; const CreateEvent = () => { const { user } = useAuth(); const [message, setMessage] = useState(""); const { register, reset, handleSubmit } = useForm(); const onSubmit = (data) => { // console.log(data); axios .post( "https://light-of-islam-server-production-0204.up.railway.app/events", data ) .then((res) => { if (res.data.insertedId) { setMessage("Your event created SuccessFully!"); reset(); window.location.replace("/dashboard/allevents"); } }); }; return (

{message}
